title: Distortion
lyrics:
Give up, give up
Can't stop the power
Stop the power
Stop the power
Give up, give up
Can't stop the power

Stop the power

Caught in a bad dream

Give up, give up

Can't stop the power

Give up, give up

Is this the bad dream?

Give up, give up

Can't stop the power

Give up, give up

To distortion!



歪んだ身体 叫び出す

(Yuganda karada sakebidasu)

Woah Woah Woah Woah

歪んだ痛み 切りつ�'る

(Yuganda itami kiritsukeru)

汚い世界だった

(Kitanai sekai datta)

歪んだ翼 飛べるなら

(Yuganda tsubasa toberunara)

Woah Woah Woah Woah

歪んだ支配 恐れない

(Yuganda shihai osorenai)

偽善者なんて 切り捨てちまえよ

(Gizen-sha nante kirisutechimae yo)
